common.dragDropHere: Drag & drop file here or click to select file
common.multiDragDropHere: Drag & drop files here or click to select files (max {{maxFiles}})

merge.title: PDF Merge
merge.description: Combine 2 PDF files into a single document

split.title: PDF Split
split.description: Split a PDF document into two parts
split.explanation: The PDF will be split into two parts. Pages 1 to {{page}} will be in the first part, and the remaining pages will be in the second part.

remove.title: Remove Page
remove.description: Remove a specific page from the PDF document
remove.explanation: Page {{page}} will be removed from the PDF.

extract.title: Extract Pages
extract.description: Extract specific pages from your PDF document into a new file
extract.explanation: Pages {{start}} to {{end}} will be extracted from the PDF into a new document.

reorder.title: PDF Page Reorder
reorder.description: Rearrange the order of pages in your PDF document
reorder.explanation: Enter the page numbers in the order you want them to appear in the output PDF. For example, 2,1,4,3 will reorder a 4-page document so that the second page becomes first, the first page becomes second, and so on.

password.title: Add Password to PDF
password.description: Encrypt your PDF document with a password
password.explanation: The uploaded PDF will be encrypted with the password you provide.

removePassword.title: Remove Password from PDF
removePassword.description: Remove password protection from your PDF document
removePassword.explanation: The uploaded PDF will have its password protection removed.

toImages.title: PDF to Images
toImages.description: Convert each page of your PDF to PNG images
toImages.explanation: Each page of your PDF will be converted to a PNG image and downloaded as a ZIP file.

rotate.title: Rotate PDF Pages
rotate.description: Rotate specific pages in your PDF document
rotate.explanation: Enter the page numbers and their corresponding rotation angles (in degrees). If you enter only one rotation value, it will be applied to all selected pages.

watermark.title: Add Watermark to PDF
watermark.description: Add a text watermark to every page of your PDF document
watermark.explanation: The watermark will be added to every page of your PDF.

dashboard.title: PDF Tools
dashboard.description: Choose a tool to modify your PDF documents

errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

errors.uploadFirst: Please upload a PDF file first
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.mergeFailed: Error merging PDF files. Please check your PDF files or settings.
errors.splitFailed: Error splitting PDF file. Please check your PDF file or settings.
errors.removeFailed: Error removing page from PDF. Please check your PDF file or settings.
errors.extractPagesFailed: Error extracting pages from PDF. Please check your PDF file or settings.
errors.reorderPagesFailed: Error reordering PDF pages. Please check your PDF file or settings.
errors.addPasswordFailed: Error adding password to PDF. Please check your PDF file or settings.
errors.removePasswordFailed: Error removing password from PDF. Please check your PDF file or settings.
errors.toImagesFailed: Error converting PDF to images. Please check your PDF file or settings.
errors.rotatePagesFailed: Error rotating PDF pages. Please check your PDF file or settings.
errors.addWatermarkFailed: Error adding watermark to PDF. Please check your PDF file or settings.

guide.title: User Guide
guide.description: Learn how to use our PDF manipulation tools effectively

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to our PDF manipulation application. This guide will help you understand how to use our tools effectively, both through the user interface and programmatically via our API.

merge.steps:
To merge PDFs:
1) Upload two PDF files using the file selector or drag and drop.
2) Optionally specify an output filename (default: merged.pdf).
3) Click 'Merge' to combine the files.

split.steps:
To split a PDF:
1) Upload a PDF file.
2) Enter the page number where you want to split the document.
3) Optionally specify filenames for both parts (default: part1.pdf and part2.pdf).
4) Click 'Split' to create two separate PDFs.

remove.steps:
To remove a page:
1) Upload a PDF file.
2) Enter the page number you want to remove.
3) Optionally specify an output filename (default: removed.pdf).
4) Click 'Remove' to create a new PDF without the specified page.

extract.steps:
To extract pages:
1) Upload a PDF file.
2) Enter the start and end page numbers for the range you want to extract.
3) Optionally specify an output filename (default: extracted.pdf).
4) Click 'Extract' to create a new PDF with only the selected pages.

reorder.steps:
To reorder pages:
1) Upload a PDF file.
2) Enter the desired page order as comma-separated numbers (e.g., '2,1,4,3').
3) Optionally specify an output filename (default: reordered.pdf).
4) Click 'Reorder Pages' to create a new PDF with the specified page order.

password.steps:
To add password protection:
1) Upload a PDF file.
2) Enter a password to protect the PDF.
3) Optionally specify an output filename (default: protected.pdf).
4) Click 'Add Password' to create an encrypted PDF.

removePassword.steps:
To remove password protection:
1) Upload a password-protected PDF file.
2) Enter the current password.
3) Optionally specify an output filename (default: unprotected.pdf).
4) Click 'Remove Password' to create an unencrypted PDF.

toImages.steps:
To convert PDF to images:
1) Upload a PDF file.
2) Optionally adjust the DPI (resolution) setting (default: 150).
3) Click 'Convert to Images' to download a ZIP file containing PNG images of each page.

rotate.steps:
To rotate pages:
1) Upload a PDF file.
2) Enter the page numbers to rotate (comma-separated).
3) Enter the rotation angles in degrees (comma-separated, e.g., '90,180,270').
4) Optionally specify an output filename (default: rotated.pdf).
5) Click 'Rotate Pages' to create a new PDF with rotated pages.

watermark.steps:
To add a watermark:
1) Upload a PDF file.
2) Enter the watermark text.
3) Optionally specify an output filename (default: watermarked.pdf).
4) Click 'Add Watermark' to create a new PDF with the watermark on every page.

api.title: API Documentation
api.description: Our application provides a RESTful API that allows you to programmatically access all PDF manipulation features. The API is documented using Swagger/OpenAPI specification.

history.title: Operation History
history.description: View and manage the history of operations performed in the application
history.deleteEntryDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this history entry? This action cannot be undone.
history.deleteAllDescription: Are you sure you want to delete all history records? This action cannot be undone.
